resources.string: It is hard to make an app and even harder to make everything working flawlessly. In such situations it is always nice to have some support, if you found an issue please file an issue on Github expressing your problems or email me, it is quick and easy and it will only make the app better

Looks your device does not support Google Play Services, it could be because of faulty implementation or your device manufacturer did not installed it, either way it is going to break some of the apps\' functionality
Your device does not seem to have the required sensors available to make this feature work :(\n\nIf you think this is a mistake please contact developer to resolve this issue as soon as possible
Your device compass sensor accuracy is low, move your device in figure eight direction to calibrate
Receive non intrusive notifications about changes in upcoming updates
